project: E-Commerce Refactor using Node.js, Express, Supabase, and GitHub Copilot
goal: Refactor and enhance an e-commerce app backend using modern best practices. Include authentication (login, register), product APIs, wishlist, and integration with Supabase PostgreSQL.

tests.backend: tests/* using Jest + Supertest for API testing

coding_guidelines: Use async/await for all database operations
Include proper error handling and response messages
Each module should have controller.js, routes.js, schema.js, and model.js if needed
All API responses must be JSON formatted with status and message

files.config/supabaseClient.js: Initialize Supabase client using @supabase/supabase-js and dotenv
files.modules/users: Contains user CRUD and authentication logic

notes: Use mocked Supabase client for unit tests
Use Supertest for route-level API tests

assist_in: Assist in writing clean Express routes and controllers
Suggest improvements during pull request reviews
